body_html:
I feel as though this issue should be re-opened, because a fresh clone of master (as of b20ec5c) results in the Aforementioned NSync compilation bug when trying to integrate libtensorflow into other apps - the only working solution was to use @alc1218 's variant of mutex.h - which is a breaking change to the codebase.

Thank you.

Thank you.
body:
I feel as though this issue should be re-opened, because a fresh clone of master (as of b20ec5c461031f9375274cf026a7dfff0f903acc) results in the Aforementioned NSync compilation bug when trying to integrate libtensorflow into other apps - the only working solution was to use @alc1218 's variant of mutex.h - which is a breaking change to the codebase. 

Thank you.
